settings.text: At Check My Body Health, we offer a variety of collection methods to make testing simple, convenient, and accessible from the comfort of your home. Each method is carefully designed to provide accurate, reliable results while being easy to perform.

Our Dried Blood Spot (DBS) method is a minimally invasive way to collect a small blood sample using a simple finger prick. This method is quick and relatively painless, making it ideal for home use. After cleaning your finger, you'll prick the skin with a lancet and drop a few spots of blood onto a special card. Once dried, the card is sent back to our lab for analysis. DBS samples are stable for extended periods, ensuring reliable results for a wide range of health markers.

Benefits of DBS:

  • Easy, quick, and convenient.
  • Minimally invasive.
  • Ideal for checking a variety of health markers, including vitamin levels, inflammation, and more.

Our Hair Bioresonance Testing method involves taking a small sample of your hair (about four strands) and sending it to our labs for analysis. Hair carries unique energetic patterns that can help identify potential imbalances in your body. This non-invasive test can provide insights into sensitivities, intolerances, and general wellness. Simply cut a few strands near the scalp and mail them to our laboratory for testing.

Benefits of Hair Bioresonance Testing:

  • Completely non-invasive.
  • No needles, blood, or discomfort.
  • Provides unique insights into sensitivities and wellness markers.

Urine rapid tests are a convenient way to assess various health markers, including hydration levels, kidney function, and potential imbalances in electrolytes or hormones. These tests are easy to administer at home - simply collect a urine sample and use a test strip for instant results.

Benefits of Urine Rapid Tests:

  • Simple and fast collection process.
  • Can provide immediate results at home.
  • Useful for detecting hydration, kidney function, and more.

Blood rapid tests offer a fast and easy way to measure important health markers from a small blood sample, collected through a quick finger prick. These tests provide instant results and are ideal for checking levels of key biomarkers like cholesterol, blood sugar, and triglycerides.

Benefits of Blood Rapid Tests:

  • Instant results available at home.
  • Quick and minimally invasive.
  • Ideal for monitoring Thyroid, Menopause FSH hormone levels, and more.

Stool rapid tests are used to analyze digestive health by detecting imbalances in the gut, such as bacterial infections or blood in the stool. This method involves collecting a small stool sample at home and using test strips for immediate results.

Benefits of Stool Rapid Tests:

  • Simple and private collection process.
  • Immediate results or in-depth lab analysis.
  • Helps identify digestive health issues, such as infections or gut imbalances.

Saliva throat swab tests offer a simple and non-invasive way to detect infections and assess various health markers, including viral and bacterial pathogens. To perform the test, you'll collect a sample by swabbing the back of your throat, which is then analysed for specific indicators. Rapid tests can provide results within minutes, allowing for quick detection of conditions such as strep throat or other respiratory infections.

Benefits of Saliva Throat Swab Rapid Tests:

  • Non-invasive and easy to administer.
  • Provides fast, reliable results.
  • Ideal for detecting respiratory infections and viral conditions.
